name: Rum Gremlin
description: A tiny fey creature with a mischievous appearance, embodying chaos and causing havoc.
memorable: Unique ability to incapacitate opponents with its Aura of Drunkenness.
goals: To create chaos and incapacitate victims through drunkenness.
relations: Related to other fey creatures, potentially interacts with drunks or mischief-makers.
environment: Typically found in areas where mischief brews, like taverns or festivity grounds.
strengths: Skilled in stealth and has magical resistance.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class make it vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Can attack with claws or bite, dealing piercing or slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Drunkenness that poisons creatures within its radius.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
skills: Highly skilled in stealth with a +5 modifier.
additional_information: Utilizes spells to control combat scenarios.
spellcasting: Can cast prestidigitation at will and command three times a day.
test_queries: stealthy creature with aura of drunkenness
